claim: Prometheus is a 2012 film that serves as a prequel.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Scott and director James Cameron developed ideas for a film that would serve as a prequel to Scott 's 1979 science-fiction horror film Alien .

claim: Prometheus is a 2012 film that serves as a prequel.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Prometheus was released on June 1 , 2012 , in the United Kingdom and on June 8 , 2012 , in North America .

claim: Prometheus is a 2012 film that serves as a prequel.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Prometheus  (  -LSB- prəˈmiːθiəs -RSB-  )  is a 2012 science fiction film directed by Ridley Scott , written by Jon Spaihts and Damon Lindelof and starring Noomi Rapace , Michael Fassbender , Guy Pearce , Idris Elba , Logan Marshall-Green and Charlize Theron .

claim: Prometheus is a 2012 film that serves as a prequel.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Spaihts wrote a script for a prequel to the events of the Alien films , but Scott opted for a different direction to avoid repeating cues from those films .
